Name: O'Neill1
Bonus: To view O'Neill's stats in Chapter 17, use 'O'Neill2'.

Name: Maeda
Bonus: Despair sets the health of its target to 1.

Name: Ronald McD1
Bonus: Ronald's gains +8 Defense and Resistance from the Macalevous he has equipped. To view Ronald's stats in the Endgame, use 'Ronald McD2'.

Name: Saias
Bonus: Saias has the Lion's Band in the first slot, which inflicts -5 Defense and Resistance, but makes all of his attacks Brave as long as it remains there.

Name: Ike
Bonus: Ikes gains +5 Defense from his weapon, Ragnell, which only he can use. He also has a fifth item in his inventory: an Iron Sword.

Name: Magorn
Bonus: Magorn gains +3 Defense from the Funny Hat in his inventory.

Name: Musar
Bonus: Musar gains +3 Defense from the Funny Hat in his inventory, as well as an extra +5 Skill and Speed from his weapon, Horsetti.

Name: Riddell
Bonus: Riddell can be recruited. He also gains +5 Strength and loses -5 Movement from the Strength Ring and Leisure Ring he carries, respectively.

Name: O'Neill2
Bonus: To view O'Neill's stats in the Prologue, use 'O'Neill1'.

Name: Sephiroth
Bonus: Sephiroth gains +5 Defense and Resistance, and +3 Strength and Speed from Masamune, his weapon. However, he cannot crit with it.

Name: Raven
Bonus: Raven can be talked to with Priscilla to obtain the Holy Blade.

Name: Ares
Bonus: Ares gains +20 Skill, +10 Resistance, and Critical Force from his weapon, Mystletainn, which can only be used by him. He also carries Mystletainn, granting him an additional +3 Movement.

Name: Samto
Bonus: Samto can be recruited by talking to him with anyone. You should look at every possible recruitment line you can.

Name: Ronald McD2
Bonus: Ronald gains +10 Magic, +5 Skill, +5 Speed, +5 Defense, and +5 Resistance from his Macaloptous when equipped. As well, he also gains +25 Magic, Skill, Speed, Defense, and Resistance from The Beginning, an item in his inventory. To view Ronald's stats in Chapter 12, use 'Ronald McD1'.

Name: Number 12
Bonus: Number 12 (along with every other 'Number') gains +5 Strength, Magic, and Skill, along with +3 Defense and Resistance, from The End, an item in their inventory that cannot be stolen due to Watchful. To view Number 12's stats antemortem, use 'Grimace'.

Name: Number 15
Bonus: Number 15 (along with every other 'Number') gains +5 Strength, Magic, and Skill, along with +3 Defense and Resistance, from The End, an item in their inventory that cannot be stolen due to Watchful. To view Number 15's stats antemortem, use 'Birdie'.

Name: Number 16
Bonus: Number 16 (along with every other 'Number') gains +5 Strength, Magic, and Skill, along with +3 Defense and Resistance, from The End, an item in their inventory that cannot be stolen due to Watchful. To view Number 16's stats antemortem, use 'Hamburglar'.

Name: Number 17
Bonus: Number 17 (along with every other 'Number') gains +5 Strength, Magic, and Skill, along with +3 Defense and Resistance, from The End, an item in their inventory that cannot be stolen due to Watchful. To view Number 17's stats antemortem, use 'O'Neill1' or 'O'Neill2'.

Name: Number 8
Bonus: Number 8 (along with every other 'Number') gains +5 Strength, Magic, and Skill, along with +3 Defense and Resistance, from The End, an item in their inventory that cannot be stolen due to Watchful. To view Number 8's stats antemortem, use 'Kempf'.
